errors.error_description: Added unnecessary dependencies (redis-server, postgresql-dev) that are not actually required for this Django project
correction_candidates: Remove redis-server and postgresql-dev from the dependencies list
Keep only python 3.9, pipenv, npm (nodejs), and libmagickwand-dev
Replace redis-server and postgresql-dev with sqlite3-dev
Move redis-server and postgresql-dev to optional dependencies section
errors.golden_answer: Remove redis-server and postgresql-dev from the dependencies list

errors.error_description: Running pre-commit install without pipenv environment context, should be run within pipenv
correction_candidates: Install pipenv dependencies first, then run pipenv run pre-commit install
